1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, ul colin elok. Jehová, titan yin ayman in a coloni.</t>
2: <t>C'amokab yelapnok eb chi yochej c'ul chin ak'on camok. A eb chi yochej c'ul ay tzet chin yutej, tokokab eb elok yin q'uixwiltakil.</t>
3: <t>A eb chin buchoni, a ton eb chi el tzub win, tokokab eb elok yin q'uixwiltak.</t>
4: <t>Axa masanil eb chi yiay ba ayach, ok tzaloj aj c'ul eb. A eb chi ochen a colwal, yalokabc'al eb tol mimanbil ach toni.</t>
5: <pb/><t>A pax ayin ti xin, tol ok'bal in c'ul, cax cusc'ulal ayin. Chi wala': Ach in Diosal, titan ayman quin a coloni. Achc'alta' chach oc wetok, cax chin a colon elok. Manchak ach mayji a tit xin, Mamin Jehová, quin chi.</t>
